messages.content: Really not sure how that’s your takeaway.
I don't understand how her hair is 'too light' or how that effects the concealer.
Oh, I see what you did... Trying to confuse me.
most conservatives have been pissed at cities in Minnesota raising the age to buy tobacco, I guess i'm a little confused on what you are talking about.
I never understood the point of parole. Seems to me like an expensive way to increase recidivism.
I'd imagine the confusion would be far greater, especially amongst the [RELIGION] community considering there is no aspect of Ramadan that prevents [NAME] from doing exams.
i know there were talks about it, but its doubtful :(
Oh [NAME]. But I'm sort of confused as to how the pic was taken, sorry if you said it but I'm a bit stupid and tired
In my opinion, there should have never been a canon character... Maybe keeping it a mystery would be the BEST!
Same here. I just don't understand how NOBODY at Lucasfilm said during the production, "Hey maybe this is a bad idea."
She said she was ok moving out ... now she isn’t. I have no idea.
Crippling? How so? It’s with Fox Sports right? I figured they probably had a good deal with them, but maybe not.
I doubt people are *happy*, but they probably aren’t sad about someone who was potentially endangering others through their anti-science views.
Am i missing something or is this an antijoke that doesn't belong here?
I guess there's this, but that's all I can think of.
Op is likely young and clueless. There’s likely a reason they’re in retail.
I think in 1.0 it's a lot harder to SDI out of Fox's dair, but I forget why
Idk why you got downvoted but heres an upvote
Maybe he *did* leave the building. If you can't find him, he could've left without you knowing. Is that better or worse?
Idk why you’re getting down voted I also pick it every time and almost always get it done on that initial skirmish
Of course I remember a time when I didn't know what calories were. I was a child.
